General.Description: Komodo (KMD) is an open source coding encoding. It was launched in September 2016 and has grown from BitcoinDark (BTCD) and was developed by the same developer (
). However, the basic software has been extracted from Zcash. The new cryptocurrency runs on the SuperNET platform, utilizing SuperNET's infrastructure and software applications.
General.Features: KMD coin includes some powerful features. Firstly, users can enjoy all the benefits of our technology without restrictions or commitments. Secondly, Komodo platform is built on the foundation of security and privacy, bringing peace of mind. Finally, it allows the Komodo technologies and specialists to speed up your blockchain development so that you can focus on your application.
General.Technology: Using a new consensus mechanism that is developed by the Komodo team, Proof of Work, Komodo blocks can be justified using Bitcoin blockchain. KMD is issued through the Equihash-based PoW protocol, and new block information is sent to the pre-selected notary node.
